It's a great layering piece to put under a vest or jacket as the fabric is thin enough that it doesn't bunch up
Fits as expected. More of a “slouchy” look but the material is very soft.  It is a nice weight.  I would recommend laying it flat to dry than using a dryer

评论概述: More of a shirt than sweater
评论详情: I ordered this sweater in khaki, and it's a beautiful color, and the ribbing makes me think of clothes I had in the 90s, which is trendy right now. It fits true to size. The couple things I dislike about it are that, as other reviewers have stated, the top is quite thin to be classified as a sweater; also, this shirt is very soft and fuzzy on the outside, but not as much on the inside. I was hoping for something that would be cozier on a cold winter day, but this isn't it. Good top for fall or spring, though.

I am in love with the feel of this sweater.  It is just so soft and comfortable.  I am sure it is something that I will wear often this coming winter.  I also like the cuffs on the sleeves.  They stay in place on my shortish arms!  And the cuff is long enough to roll up if needed and still look good.  It is a classic!
